mapper.select: select item_code, item_title, price, madein, reg_date, item_spec from (select rownum rank, a.* from (select item_code, item_title, price, madein , to_char(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_date, item_spec from sellingitems_tbl where item_title like '%' || #{name} || '%') a ) where rank > #{start} and rank < #{end}
select count(*) from sellingitems_tbl where item_title like '%' || #{name} || '%'
mapper.update: update sellingitems_tbl set item_title=#{item_title}, madein=#{madein}, item_spec=#{item_spec}, price=#{price} where item_code = #{item_code}
mapper.select: select count(*) from sellingitems_tbl where item_code=#{code}
